mapper.insert: INSERT INTO _events (ref_id, event_type, event_id, event_data, occurred_at, state, created_by, created_at) VALUES (#{refId}, #{eventType}, #{eventId}, #{eventData}, #{occurredAt}, #{state}, #{createdBy}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE _events SET ref_id = #{refId}, event_type = #{eventType}, event_id = #{eventId}, event_data = #{eventData}, occurred_at = #{occurredAt}, state = #{state}, created_by = #{createdBy}, version = version + 1, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
